title: Game crashes
body: After I downloaded patch 6.9 my league game crashes after champ select and cant join the game, I sit there and hit reconnect for 10 mins and when I finally do get in the game I have good ping and FPS but my chatacter won't move because the game is constantly disconnecting. NEED HELP!

replies.body:
Given that your issues involve not being able to get into the game, but also disconnecting while in-game as well seem to point to some sort of weird connection issue.  Essentially, your computer isn't able to maintain a stable and consistent connection to the individual game server.  To resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)  While it has a ton of steps, the solutions there should get this resolved and keep you connected.

Give me a heads up if you still have any issues!
The game keeps constantly crashing, it was fine until 2 days after I downloaded patch 6.9

Just to clarify, is the game still crashing despite completing all of the steps in the Connection Issues Article?  Remember, every single one is crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Reply back and let me know!
Yes, I did each step, the only games I can get into are custom games with only me in them. The rest still won't let me connect.
